text: @realDonaldTrump If @realDonaldTrump or @VP test positive to #COVID19 can I suggest a cocktail of hydroxychloroquine, disinfectant and sunlight injected? Should be perfect, better than any treatment before, like you knew about this treatment before there even was a pandemic.
